m.chooseSendMethod: Choose how you would like to send your hongbao
m.chooseFrom: Choose from a collection of hongbao art
m.buidlt: Buidl-t with <3 on Ethereum and IPFS
m.buidltCC: Buidl-t on Ethereum and IPFS by the crypto collectible community
m.cardShopSub: Creative, unique art pieces from from all around the interwebs.
m.noWeb3: No web3 wallet could be detected! ðŸ§
m.noWeb3desc: In order to create a new radi card you require a web3 browser and account with Ether. We recommend you try
m.addMessage: Add a message (This will be visible on the blockchain)
m.topUpDesc: You need to add at least 0.02 ETH (for the gas fee) in order to create a new radicard.
m.topUpStable: Top-up your radicard with stable cryptocurrency
m.donateCharity: Donate to charity of your choice
m.noETH: You don't have enough ETH to send that much! Your ETH balance is
m.noDAI: You don't have enough DAI to send that much! Your DAI balance is
m.minETH: You have selected too little ETH to pay for the card! The minimum price for this card is
m.minDAI: You have selected too little DAI to pay for the card! The minimum price for this card is
m.addMoneyDesc: Add ether or DAI to your hongbao
m.supported: Send your hongbao via WeChat, Twitter, Facebook
m.sendDirect: Send hongbao to a recipient right away
m.sendLater: Send hongbao to a recipient at a later time
m.sendOwn: Send to my own ETH wallet address
m.readyDesc: Now send this hongbao to your friends!
m.transactionTriggeredDesc: Please accept the transaction in your web3 provider, such as metamask, ImToken ect.
m.DAIDisclaimer: As you requested to send DAI with your card you will need to first approve for the RadiCards contract to access the specified DAI amount from your wallet. This means you will need to sign two transactions to generate your card.
m.cardCreatedDesc: This might take few seconds or minutes, depending on how favourable the Ethereum gods are.ðŸ¤ž
m.cardCreatedDesc2: Best to not close this tab and go make some tea.
m.cardCreatedDesc4: You can view the transaction of Etherscan
m.sendSuccess: We've successfully sent an awesome Radicard to
m.claimableLink: We've successfully generated a claimable link for your Radicard gift! Send this link to your friend and they can claim the card and crypto contents.
m.shareOthersEmail: email this radicard to your friend
m.shareOthersLink: send this radicard via a chat app by copy and paste this link
m.pickAnother: Pick another card and keep rocking
m.oopsDesc: Something seems to have gone wrong and your card could not be created.
m.checkWalletDesc: (Metamask, Coinbase Wallet, Status, Portis) to see the status of the transaction, or try again.
m.viewEthScan: You can view the transaction of Etherscan
